description: WinSparkle is a plug-and-forget software update library for Windows applications. It is heavily inspired by the Sparkle framework for OS X written by Andy Matuschak and others, to the point of sharing the same updates format (appcasts) and having very similar user interface.
notes:
This is a non auto-updated version!
Note that this install package is just a library to include in your C#.NET and it also doesn't create any shortcuts nor shims as it has no actual executables other than DLLs!
